summary: When you walk down the road past Fort Greymoor to the west of Whiterun, a thief robs you and takes all your stuff.  You will have to chase him into the fort if you want your things back.
descriptionHtml:
Mod:  You Get Robbed 1_0
Game:  TES V: Skyrim
Author:  Freddy the Noob et al.                                    
Date:  6/25/12                   
************************************************************************
CONTENTS                          
************************************************************************
1. Information on the Mod
2. Installation
3. Version History
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
5. Copy Status and Credits
************************************************************************
1. INFORMATION ON THE MOD           
************************************************************************
	   When you walk down the road past Fort Greymoor to the west of Whiterun, a thief robs 
you and takes all your stuff.  You will have to chase him into the fort if you want your things 
back.

	   It might be sort of hard to retrieve your gear, since the thief now has all your 
weapons, armor, potions, and scrolls.  He has probably equipped some of your armor and weapons
by now too.

	   To make it worse, he is level 35, and hangs around with a trio of high-level bandits.

	   But looking at the bright side of things, he didn\'t kill you.  And the weather is 
not too bad.  It isn\'t even snowing on your bare skin. 	   	    
************************************************************************
2. Installation                           
************************************************************************
           Extract (decompress) the .esp and the .bsa to your Skyrim directory.  
(It will be something like *Installation directory*\\Skyrim\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)
Mark the box next to \"You Get Robbed.esp\" in your mod manager.
 
           Alternately, extract files someplace else.  Then move the .esp and .bsa 
to Skyrim\\Data.  Mark the box next to the plugin in your mod manager.
************************************************************************
3. Version History    
************************************************************************
V 1.0    6/25/12   Initial release.   
************************************************************************
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
************************************************************************
	   Many gamers do not enjoy being robbed, losing all their gear, and running around 
barefoot.  This mod may not appeal to them.  But I must state in advance that we will not build
any patches for this mod to make it so you don\'t get robbed, lose all your gear, and run around 
barefoot.  The mod would lose its reason for being if we did that.

	   This mod will be easier for high-level characters than low-level characters.  Easier 
for mages than for other classes.  Easier for those with companions than for those without.

	   This mod does not look quite as good during games when you have joined a civil war 
faction.

	   This mod could do with some more play-testing.

	   If you locate a bug, contact David Brasher on TES Nexus so that the situation can be
examined and can hopefully be fixed. 
************************************************************************
5. Copy Status and Credits           
************************************************************************
Credits:      Freddy the Noob - Team Lead, Voice Actor
	      David Brasher - Questcoder/Scripter, Uploader/Caretaker
	      SlothGirl - Play-tester  

	      Bethesda for making Skyrim in an open format anyone can mod.
		
Copy Status:  Public domain with proper attribution and courtesy notification.  Abiding by these
	      restrictions, you may distribute this mod or parts of it or mods that are made using 
	      content from it.      
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
author: Freddy the Noob et al
